message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $90 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $87.50, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
